steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`

scenarios.title: check surgeon profile design

steps.value: !-- To update once backend is linked to frontend
When I go to relative URL `/my-account`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-surgeon-profile` ignoring:［
|ELEMENT                    |
|By.testId(jnj-account-menu)|］

scenarios.title: check main section with expanding accordions

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(<accordion-name>)`
When I change context to element located by `testId(<accordion-name>)`
!-- The step below requires working backend
When I click on element located by `testId(<accordion-name>)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-bio)))`
When I change context to element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-bio)))`
!-- The step below requires working backend
!-- Then text `${<accordion-details>}` exists
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-bio)))`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-credentials)))`
When I change context to element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-credentials)))`
!-- The step below requires working backend
!-- Then text `${<accordion-details>}` exists
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-credentials)))`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-publications)))`
When I change context to element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-publications)))`
!-- The step below requires working backend
!-- Then text `${<accordion-details>}` exists
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-profile-accordion-publications)))`
!-- The steps below require working backend
!-- When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-my-profile-accordion-procedures)`
!-- When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-my-profile-accordion-procedures)`
!-- Then text `<chip-name>` exists
